7ffec6a4-1d41-4f43-a600-2335671c3eb1:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"7ffec6a4-1d41-4f43-a600-2335671c3eb1","title":{"en":"MW"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ムウ"},{"ja-ro":"Mū"},{"ko":"MW - 뮤"},{"ko-ro":"myu"},{"ja":"MW - ムウ"},{"nl":"Moe"},{"pt":"MW - Psicopatia Profana"}],"lastChapter":"26","availableTranslatedLanguages":["pt-br","pl","en"],"relatedIdds":["e743e1fb-7909-4029-a87a-672d85593704"],"description":{"de":"(amazon.gr)\n\nOsamu Tezuka auf düsteren Pfaden: MW\n\nMit MW legt Carlsen das wohl düsterste Werk von Osamu Tezuka, dem Erfinder des modernen Manga, erstmals als deutsche Ausgabe vor. Darin erforscht Tezuka die dunklen, schmerzhaften Facetten menschlicher Eigenschaften, von religiöser Scheinheiligkeit bis hin zum Sadismus. Im Mittelpunkt der Geschichte: ein Bankangestellter mit zwei Gesichtern und ein Priester, zu dem er sich auf geheimnisvolle Art hingezogen fühlt...\nDer Schöpfer von Werken wie KIMBA und BUDDHA zeigt sich hier stark beeinflusst vom harten Realismus der Gekiga-Bewegung und entwirft einen der atemberaubendsten Thriller der modernen Manga-Historie, der auch Jahrzehnte nach seiner Entstehung nichts von seiner Faszination verloren hat.","en":"Michio Yuki has it all: looks, intelligence, a pedigree as the scion of a famous Kabuki family, a promising career at a major bank, legions of female admirers. But underneath the sheen of perfection lurks a secret with the power to shake the world to its foundations.  \n  \nDuring a boyhood excursion to one of the southern archipelagos near Okinawa, Yuki barely survived exposure to a poison gas stored at a foreign military facility. The leakage annihilated all of the island’s inhabitants but was promptly covered up by the authorities, leaving Yuki as an unacknowledged witness—one whose sense of right and wrong, however, the potent nerve agent managed to obliterate.  \n  \nNow, fifteen years later, Yuki is a social climber of Balzacian proportions, infiltrating the worlds of finance and politics by day while brutally murdering children and women by night—perversely using his Kabuki-honed skills as a female impersonator to pass himself off as the women he’s killed. His drive, however, will not be satiated with a promotion here and a rape there. Michio Yuki has a far more ominous objective: obtaining MW, the ultimate weapon that spared his life but robbed him of all conscience.  \n  \nThere are only two men with any hope of stopping him: one, a brilliant public prosecutor who struggles to build a case against the psychopath; the other, a tormented Catholic priest, Iwao Garai, who shares Yuki’s past—and frequently his bed.\n\n[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/mw/)\n\n---\n**Volumes 301-303 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**","it":"(amazon.it)\nNegli anni Sessanta, al largo di Okinawa, l'esercito americano e le forze di autodifesa giapponesi perdono il controllo di un'arma chimica micidiale chiamata MW. L'incidente provoca un'ecatombe sull'isola del Pacifico e viene insabbiato da politici e militari. Solo due ragazzini sopravvivono. Tra i due si distingue uno dei personaggi più spietati mai nati dalla matita di Osamu Tezuka: Michio Yuki, che scaglia la sua vendetta contro la società con ferocia cieca e istintiva."},"links":{"al":"31677","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B07572DSGW","ap":"mw","bw":"series/1977/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2522933","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/348764/","engtl":"https://kodansha.us/series/mw/","kt":"3574","mal":"1677","mu":"11737","raw":"https://www.fukkan.com/fk/CartSearchDetail?i_no=68326575"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"92d6d951-ca5e-429c-ac78-451071cbf064","name":{"en":"Office Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.","pt-br":"Guts, conhecido como o Espadachim Negro, busca refúgio das forças demoníacas atraídas por ele e sua mulher por causa de uma marca demoníaca em seus pescoços, e também vingança contra o homem que o marcou como um sacrifício profano.  Ajudado apenas por sua força titânica adquirida de uma infância dura vivida com mercenários, uma espada gigantesca e uma mão esquerda protética de ferro, Guts deve lutar contra seu destino sombrio, enquanto luta com uma raiva que pode despojá-lo de sua humanidade.","ru":"Гатс – Черный Мечник, за которым охотятся демоны. Черный Мечник противостоит жестокой судьбе благодаря непоколебимой воле, невероятной силе, и, конечно же, меча. Постоянные сражения со злом приближает Гатса к параллельному миру тьмы, лишая его человечности. И после проложу для тебя дорогу к трону…\nЭтот мужчина, похожий на злодея, нашёптывал мне сладкие слова на ушко своим нежнейшим голосом.\n- Итак, твой ответ?\nИ правда, смогу ли я остановить петлю, затягивающуюся на моей шее, и переродиться истинной злодейкой?"},"links":{"al":"123213","ap":"agnyeo-meikeo-promo","kt":"57468","mu":"165792","nu":"villainess-maker","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=50953648"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"d14322ac-4d6f-4e9b-afd9-629d5f4d8a41","name":{"en":"Villainess"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Art by Haori, Story by Michikusa Yamori.\n2. \"Ryuujin Hitou Monogatari: Oishii Gohan to Neko to Onsen ga Areba\" (龍神秘湯物語～美味しいごはんと猫と温泉があれば～). Art by Inaru, Story by Arisawa Mahiro. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2279hj/)\n3. \"Keiyaku Fuufu ni Ai Aru Kekkon Seikatsu wo\" (契約夫婦に愛ある結婚生活を). Art by Mochida Moo, Story by Shikimi Akira.\n4. \"Watakushi no Shiawase wa, Ima Koko ni\" (わたくしの幸せは、今ここに). Art by Hanashino Yuno, Story by Mayumi Rino. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7596dx/)\n5. \"Ayakashi Yashiki ni Ochita Hana\" (あやかし屋敷に堕ちた花), Art by Kawano Akiko, Story by Machibari. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6404hj/)\n\n**Volume 2 Contents:**\n1. \"Shirohebi-sama no Hanayome wa, Ubawareteita Namae wo Torimodoshi Shiawase na Michi wo Ayumu: Ezukesarete Uritobasareru to Omotteitara, Matteita no wa Torokeru you na Dekiai deshita\" (白蛇さまの花嫁は、奪われていた名前を取り戻し幸せな道を歩む～餌付けされて売り飛ばされると思っていたら、待っていたのは蕩けるような溺愛でした～). Art by Yumoto Miko, Story by Itsukawa Midori. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4142hr/)\n2. \"Tamamushiiro no Renjou\" (玉虫色の恋情). Art by Inanami Gohachi, Story by Shikimi Aki.\n3. \"Wakimaeru no wo Yameta Ane Hime wa, Ikoku no Tei ni Aisareru\" (弁えるのをやめた姉姫は、異国の帝に愛される). Art by Chairoi Risu, Story by Suzuki Himari. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7435gv/)\n4. \"Aru Kazoku Reijou no Haranbanjou na Jinsei\" (或る華族令嬢の波乱万丈な人生). Art by Umibara Yuta, Story by Torigara Sasami. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4412go/)\n5. \"Hana wa Kaitou ni Metorareru\" (花は怪盗に娶られる). Art by Hadzuki, Story by Machibari.\n\n**Volume 3 Contents:**\n1. 初恋と約束. Art by 白良木羅々, Story by Touma Rico.\n2. 心恋し、おもひでの君. Art by sawaco, Story by 和泉.\n3. 鳥と少女. Art by Akinashi Yuka, Story by 雨宮小傘. [Original Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1315cb/)\n4. 君の笑顔が見たいから. Art by うき太郎, Story by Makiburo. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5461gy/)\n5. 咲けぬ桜花の華嫁は不器用な雲雀に愛される. Art by Haori, Story by Michikusa Yamori.","ja":"「小説家になろう」掲載の短編を中心に 和風シンデレラストーリーをコミカライズ！ 不遇な境遇に置かれた儚げなヒロインが、嫁入りをきっかけに幸せになる物語を5本収録。 ALLハッピーエンドです♪\n\nカバーイラスト：白谷ゆう\n\n**第1巻の内容：**\n\n1. 『落ちこぼれ華嫁は日向の愛で花開く』　漫画：羽おり　原作：道草家守\n座敷牢で育ったタンポポの“華嫁”は、太陽のような旦那様から求婚されて……？\n2. 『龍神秘湯物語～美味しいごはんと猫と温泉があれば～』　漫画：いなる　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2279hj/)：有沢真尋\n意地悪な伯父の家を出て、三食まかない\u0026温泉付きのお屋敷の、住み込み女中として働きます！\n3. 『契約夫婦に愛ある結婚生活を』　漫画：餅田むぅ　原作：しきみ彰\n利害が一致したお見合い結婚だけれど、呪いに苦しむ旦那様が気がかりで――？\n4. 『わたくしの幸せは、今ここに』　漫画：花篠ゆの　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7596dx/)：真弓りの\n想い人の皇子に、隣国へ嫁ぐよう命じられた姫君が出会ったのは……？\n5. 『あやかし屋敷に堕ちた花』　漫画：かわのあきこ　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6404hj/)：マチバリ\n奉公先の主人から妾になるよう知られ、逃げ出した先で出会った美しい人の正体は――？\n\n**第2巻の内容：**\n1. 『白蛇さまの花嫁は、奪われていた名前を取り戻し幸せな道を歩む～餌付けされて売り飛ばされると思っていたら、待っていたのは蕩けるような溺愛でした～』　漫画：湯本みこ　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4142hr/)：石河 翠\n名前を奪われた孤独な令嬢は、麗しい異国の青年と出会い――？\n2. 『玉虫色の恋情』　漫画：伊七海五八　原作：しきみ彰\n嫁ぎ先で迎えてくれた旦那様は、美しく成長した初恋の人で……？\n3. 『弁えるのをやめた姉姫は、異国の帝に愛される』　漫画：茶色井りす　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7435gv/)：鈴木日万利\n冷遇される覚悟だったのに、なぜか帝から寵愛され……!?\n4. 『或る華族令嬢の波乱万丈な人生』　漫画：海原ゆた　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4412go/)：鳥柄ささみ\n家を出て婚約者の元へ嫁ぐことだけが、私の唯一の望みだったのに――。\n5. 『花は怪盗に娶られる』　漫画：葉月　原作：マチバリ\n婚約破棄を望む貧乏令嬢の前に現れたのは、街で噂の怪盗紳士!?\n\n**第3巻の内容：**\n1. 『初恋と約束』　漫画：白良木羅々　原作：当麻リコ\n義母と義妹からいじめられても、従順な振りをしてやり過ごしていたら…!?\n2. 『心恋し、おもひでの君』　漫画：sawaco　原作：和泉\n幼い頃に名も知らぬ少年と交わした、結婚の約束。迎えに来てくれるなんてあり得ないと思っていた――。\n3. 『鳥と少女』　漫画：ぽんぬ　[原作 (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1315cb/)：雨宮小傘\n幼い頃に自身を拾い育ててくれた鴉天狗を 健気に慕う、人間の娘の恋の行方は…？\n4. 『君の笑顔が見たいから』　漫画：うき太郎　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5461gy/)：まきぶろ\n許婚を奪われ破滅する悪役令嬢に転生した と思っていたのに、ヒロインは現れず…!?\n5. 『咲けぬ桜花の華嫁は不器用な雲雀に愛される』　漫画：羽おり　原作：道草家守\n咲けなくなった元最上位の“華嫁”。もう価値はないと言われていたけれど――？"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CBB7ZZLQ","bw":"series/383282","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/searchuni?term.media_format=\u0026q=%E8%99%90%E3%81%92%E3%82%89%E3%82%8C%E4%B9%99%E5%A5%B3%E3%81%AE%E5%B9%B8%E3%81%9B%E3%81%AA%E5%AB%81%E5%85%A5%E3%82%8A","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/727763/","mu":"rrz2twe","raw":"https://www.cmoa.jp/title/254343/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

8094c739-bf97-41f9-9dae-ee7f8eff78d1:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"8094c739-bf97-41f9-9dae-ee7f8eff78d1","title":{"en":"Tenants from Another World"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"이세계 세입자들"},{"ru":"Арендаторы из другого мира"}],"lastChapter":"50","description":{"en":"Haeseo Han is an ordinary, hard-working office worker whose main concerns revolve around being overlooked for promotions, smug colleagues, and workplace stress.\n\nThat is, until she finds herself intertwined in a prophecy that will determine the fate of a fantasy world!\n\nIn the realm of the Beiston Empire, Haeseo is seen as the oracle who will determine the next successor to the throne and bring peace to the country.\n\nHoping to win Haeseo’s favor and become the next emperor, the three charming yet eccentric princes of Beiston cross over into Haeseo’s world to begin their lives together as housemates","ru":"Хаесео Хан - обычный трудолюбивый офисный работник, которого больше всего беспокоит, что его упускают из виду из-за повышения по службе, самодовольных коллег и стресса на рабочем месте. On one end he has to deal with his everyday life as a student - on the other, he needs to deal with the mysteries of his Stand.  \n  \nOne day he begins travelling throughout Russia, all the way from Vladivostok to Moscow! There are sure to be faithful friends and clever enemies, comedy and drama, and of course - Stand battles. 81c0efa5-041b-40c2-bd94-f4ca09d57bd9:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"81c0efa5-041b-40c2-bd94-f4ca09d57bd9","title":{"en":"Kasane"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"累"}],"lastChapter":"17","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es"],"description":{"en":"Shinkichi, 21, is hired as a servant by Mrs. Toyoshiga, a sought-after music teacher. Despite the considerable age difference, they become lovers. But Toyoshiga is a jealous woman who can't stand the attention her female students pay Shinkichi, particularly the young and pretty O-hisa. This consuming jealousy may be the cause of the boil that appears one day under the teacher's left eye and grows disfiguring.\n“Kasane” is inspired by a famous Japanese legend that is still often performed in Kabuki theater today.","es":"Shinkichi, de 21 años, es contratado como sirviente por la señora Toyoshiga, una cotizada maestra de música. A pesar de la considerable diferencia de edad, se convierten en amantes. Pero Toyoshiga es una mujer celosa que no soporta la atención que sus alumnos le prestan a Shinkichi, en particular a la joven y guapa O-hisa. Estos celos consumidores puede ser la causa del forúnculo que aparece un día bajo el ojo izquierdo de la maestra y que crece hasta desfigurarla.\n“Kasane” está inspirado en una famosa leyenda japonesa que, aún hoy, se representa a menudo en el teatro Kabuki."},"links":{"mal":"41341","mu":"p3jqi87"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3bb26d85-09d5-4d2e-880c-c34b974339e9","name":{"en":"Ghosts"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

De repente apareció un ángel y le ofreció reencarnar.\n\n‘’Tú, una amante de las novelas de fantasía romántica (Rofan) ¿Te gustaría reencarnar en un mundo que basado en ellas?’’ \n\nTerminó reencarnando porque dijo que tendría un padre y hermano (guapos) que tendría una vida llena de lujos, e incluso le daría habilidades especiales, pero…. \n\n¿Podría ser hija de la aventura de una noche de mi madre?\n\nNada más nacer la confiaron a la familia de su madre y sufrió de maltratos.\n  \n''¡Mierda, maldito demonio estafador! ¡¿Dónde está mi lujosa vida con un padre y hermano guapos y amorosos?!'' - Dijo frotando el amplio suelo del salón de la casa de su tío, el marqués Tarenka con sus manos enrojecidas e hinchadas por el frío. Su tío, aborrecía la existencia de su sobrina por lo que desde que nació en este nuevo mundo, la trato como una esclava.\n\nCuando por fin aparece su 'padre' el duque de Paeraton, decide que es su última oportunidad para escapar del infierno donde vive, así que se aferra a su pierna implorando.\n\n‘’¡Papá, llévame!’’ - Sobrevivamos de alguna manera.\n\n‘’Si permanezco aquí, puedo morir de frío o hambre’’ - No se puede evitar \n\n\nAhora empieza su nueva vida con su familia, pero ¿Será de verdad hija de duque Paeraton? ¿Por qué no se parece en nada a él?\n\nAdemás, para obtener lo que desea debe usar la 'habilidad especial' que le dieron ¡Pedir y pagar! Pero para pagar debe cumplir misiones para tener efectivo… ¡Ningún lector de Rofan han tenido este tipo de misiones!\n\n¿Cómo hará para sobrevivir en este peligroso mundo basado en un Rofan?","ko":"집도, 절도, 부모도 없이 살다가 고생만 하며 죽었는데 천사가 나타나 제안했다.\n\n“로맨스판타지 소설의 프로베댓러인 당신, 로판을 참고해 만든 세계에 환생하지 않겠습니까?”\n\n(잘생긴) 아빠에, (잘생긴) 오빠들이 다이아 수저로 맘마를 떠먹여 준대서 환생했더니….\n\n—엄마가 바람피워서 낳은 자식일지도 모른다고요?\n\n태어나자마자 외가에 맡겨져 구박데기 신세로 전락했다.\n\n‘이대로라면 혼자 얼어 죽거나 굶어 죽을지도 몰라.’\n\n이렇게 된 거 어쩔 수 없다.\n\n“아빠, 나 데려가아—!”\n\n어떻게든 살아남아 보자.\n그런데,\n\n[조건을 충족했습니다.]\n[특성 를 각성합니다.]\n\n[독자님, 원하는 것을 얻기 위해선 수단과 방법을 가리지 마십시오.\n정복하고 쟁취하십시오!\n로판 독자는 이런 상황에서 뒤로 물러나지 않습니다!\n당신의 능력을 보여주세요!\n-조건: 파에라톤 공작을 설득해 를 획득.\n-보상: 5,000캐시 뽑기권\n-퀘스트 거절 패널티: 인생 하차\n-퀘스트 실패 패널티: 인생 하차]\n\n‘그러니까 퀘스트가 아빠 볼따구에 뽀뽀하는 거라고요?’\n\n…사기 당했다.\n\n*\n\n아레스가 내게 다가왔다.\n“오늘 정말 귀엽네, 내 동생.”\n“뭐, 약골 솜뭉치 주제에 봐줄 만은 하네.”\n익시온이 질세라 다가오며 말했다.\n“벽이나 부수는 저런 폭력적인 놈 말은 들을 필요 없어.”\n“아아, 속이 시커먼 놈보단 낫겠지.”\n“네게는 여전히 교육이 필요한 것 같구나.”\n“지금이라도 해볼 테냐?”\n두 사람의 눈빛에서 살기가 일렁이기 시작했다.\n아니, 또 이 패턴이냐.\n이제 나도 안 말려!\n싸울 거면 나가서 싸워!\n내 방 부수지 말고! 나는 유일한 희망인 아빠를 바라봤다.\n과연 아빠는 침착한 얼굴로 나를 바라보고 있었다.\n하아, 역시 안심된다.\n어느 때에도 냉철한 우리 아빠!\n내가 활짝 웃으며 아빠에게 손을 뻗는 순간.\n“……두렵군.”\n아빠가 살짝 비틀거리며 중얼거렸다.\n“내 딸의 귀여움은 신체를 장악할 정도다.”\n……예?\n“일시적 마비. 그 직후 비정상적으로 빠르게 일어나는 심실과 심방의 수축과 팽창.”\n“…….”\n“팔다리가 뇌의 통제를 잃고 멋대로 움직이려고 하지.”\n척, 어느새 다가온 아빠가 나를 번쩍 안아 들었다.\n저기요, 딸 안아드는 게 팔다리의 통제 운운할 거리인가요.\n나는 짜게 식은 눈으로 아빠를 내려다봤다.\n\n-------------------------------------\n\n캐시를 뽑아 로판을 소환하자!\n아기부터 시작하는 이세계 캐시 라이프!\n주해온 장편 로맨스판타지 소설 \u003c아기님 캐시로 로판 달린다\u003e","ru":"Она прожила очень трудную жизнь без крова и родителей, а когда умерла, к ней пришёл ангел с интересным предложением: «Не хотели бы вы возродиться в фэнтезийном мире, созданном по романтическому роману, преданным комментатором которого вы и являетесь?»\nОн сулил ей (красивого) отца, (красивых) братьев, не чаявших в ней души…\nА на деле никто не знает, рождена она плодом супружеской верности или измены.\nКак только малышка появилась на свет, её оставили семье матери без какой-либо поддержки.\n«Такими темпами я умру от холода или голода.»\nНичего не поделаешь.\n«Папа, забери меня!»\n«Надо как-нибудь выжить.»\nОднако…\n**[Все условия выполнены.]**\n**[Пробуждаем вашу силу «Rush and Cash».]**\n**[Сделайте всё возможное ради достижения желаемого. 824f9ea2-c50a-4fe3-b180-5e7f5bdc1c2a:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"824f9ea2-c50a-4fe3-b180-5e7f5bdc1c2a","title":{"en":"Golden Bat (TEZUKA Osamu)"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"怪盗黄金バット"},{"en":"Phantom Thief Golden Bat"},{"ja-ro":"Kaito Ogon Bat"}],"lastChapter":"1","relatedIdds":["0fda2276-395c-4052-959c-356181b7755e","2b75e996-ae27-4f96-99e8-e6bd4c152a1f","616abe83-341e-4808-a5b5-fe0643d4c983","a055644f-4efa-42c7-b3c0-dfedcdbe4df5","f49033b9-85e9-4f1d-8278-10edc515750a"],"description":{"en":"*Published as a tankobon, Tezuka's Golden Bat has not been collected in any edition of the complete works. There were several reprints even as recent as 1980, but there are no current means of being able to purchase the work outside of sites such as Mandarake.*\n\n(from [ogonbatter.web](http://ogonbatter.web.fc2.com/tezuka.html)):\n\n**\"It's the new King who's at fault. So, everyone\nI want you all to sacrifice for the sake of Justice.\"**\n\nAn innkeeper in the deep snowy mountains receives an unusual visitor. Wearing a hat and a coat, he becomes excited when he hears that Golden Bat, a thief who lurks in town, is after the \"Ruby Diamond,\" a jewel belonging to the Duke of Sarada. The policeman, suspecting that it might be the Golden Bat himself in disguise, takes away his hat, but the face that should be there is missing. The mystery guest is the invisible woman.\n\n　What exactly is a Ruby Diamond? The Duke of Sarada tells his son, Tommy, about the strange fate of this gemstone.\n　Originally, the Ruby Diamond was a treasure of the Corona royal family on the tropical  Ruby Island, and shone brilliantly on the crown as a sign of kingship. Ruby Island was a peaceful land, but one day, Minister Puky and the Physician Fuxquii plotted a rebellion and poisoned the King of Corona.\n　Princess Cocoa, forced to become Fuxquii's queen in exchange for the king's life, attempts to resist, but steps on a landmine set by the villains and dies an untimely death.\n　As her soul was taken up to heaven, God spoke softly to her, **\"Let us go to Earth, I will let you return one more time.\"**\n　Princess Cocoa's soul returned to earth to retrieve the stolen Ruby Diamond and destroy the rebels. However, since she had lost her body, she could not be seen or heard by others. She can hardly interfere in the affairs of this world.\n　As the years passed, rumors continued to circulate that the ghost of Princess Cocoa still haunted the cursed Ruby Diamond.\n\nIt is not only ghosts that haunt the Ruby Diamond that have come into the hands of the Duke of Sarada. The eyes of the Golden Bat, a thief who claims to be a descendant of Minister Puky, are shining.\n Golden Bat successfully escapes with the diamonds after raiding the Duke's mansion, but is intercepted by an invisible person.\nThe Duke of Sarada sees that it is the ghost of the princess, and gives her clothes and a mask to make her look exactly like she did before her death. He then took out the real Ruby Diamond that he had hidden in his possession. What Golden Bat had taken from him was a fake.\n　\nAt that time, Tommy followed Golden Bat to Countess Grasshopper's abode.\n　The Countess tricks Tommy into drinking a paralyzing poison. She is the true identity of the Phantom Thief Golden Bat, and her servants are in actuality Golden Bat's henchmen. When the Countess Golden Bat discovers that the Ruby Diamond is a fake, she uses Tommy as a hostage to force the Duke to hand over the Ruby Diamond to her. The Duke is forced to hand over the Ruby Diamond to Golden Bat's henchman, but the invisible Princess Cocoa secretly chases after the henchman as he is being pulled away.\n　Princess Cocoa overhears a conversation between Golden Bat and the mad scientist Dr. Tin-Tin at the Countess' mansion. The princess seizes the opportunity to retrieve the Ruby Diamond and attempts to break Tommy out of her prison. However, without the clothing of this world, her voice does not reach Tommy. After a misunderstanding, Tommy swallows the Ruby Diamond, and the Golden Bat gang thinks of transporting him to Ruby Island to dissect him.\n\nThe Duke of Sarada and Princess Cocoa board a cruise ship bound for Ruby Island in order to stop Golden Bat. The Princess says that Countess Grasshopper is Golden Bat, but the Duke of Sarada cannot believe it. When a gust of wind causes Tommy to fall overboard from her trunk, the Duke is finally convinced of the identity of Golden Bat, and he runs all over the ship, exchanging gunfire with her.\n　Then the wind played another trick. A waterspout hit the cruise ship, rolling up the seawater, and all the crew and passengers were blown away elsewhere..."},"links":{"raw":"https://aucfree.com/items/m359753115"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}
